recordTypes.name: Master Electrician's License Renewal
recordTypes.description:
Apply here to Renew you Master Electricians License 
YOU MUST HOLD A CURRENT LICENSE TO RENEW 
There will be NO Refunds

recordTypes.name: Application for Plumber's License I.D. Card
recordTypes.description: The Village of Valley Stream is part of the Tri-Town Plumbing Agreement.  Please note we do not reciprocate with Suffolk County or New York City.  Your Master License and Competency must be issued by the same town/ village within Nassau County.

categories.name: Building Department
Code Enforcement
categories.content: Welcome to the Inc. Village of Valley Stream Code Enforcement.

categories.name: Clerk / Licensing
categories.content:
Welcome to the Inc. Village of Valley Stream Clerk's Department.

We oversee the issuance of Licenses and Permits and enforce the Code of the Village of Valley Stream.

Our main goals are to promote the safety, health and general welfare of the public, provide exceptional service for the people we serve. 

2025/ 2026 Parking Permits will be available to purchase on April 7, 2025
